trends: There have been 73 other sightings in Mesa
There were no other sightings in Mesa on or around September 15th 2013
divs: sighting detailswhile out walking my dog at 4:45am mst on september 15th, 2013 i observed single light shoot a crossed sky in an arcing motion lasting about 15sec similar of what you would expect to see from a shooting star or meteor although there was no light emitting trail. the brightness of the object varied then stopped, it lit up bright then went dimmed blacked out. it seemed to come out of nowhere. it relit, shot up at an angle in a wobbling motion, the object was randomly lighting up and off going in a wobbling circular motion like trying to gain attitude then falling somewhat. this last for about 3-5 minutes. varying from left to right, up and down and lights sporadically going on and off then the object seemed to stabilized i continued to watch for about 1minute the object would go completely dark staying in one spot to fully illuminated and then randomly blinking three or four times then go dark this occurred a few times. at this point my dog distracted me and i looked down. when i looked back up to the sky the light\object was gone.
